title: 90s Denim Trucker Jacket
desc: A core essential, this denim jacket is crafted completely from cotton for a sturdy feel and breathable wear. Made with button closures along the front and dual chest pockets. Finished with topstitching and seaming details for added shape.

title: Skinny Fit Jeans
desc: An iconic essential, these reimagined jeans are made with flexible stretch denim for enhanced movement and all-day comfort. Updated with heritage inspired logo accents and an iconic logo jacron paper patch at the back waist. Cut in a skinny fit with considered detailing and reinforced seams.

title: Smooth Cotton Allover Monogram Logo Polo Shirt
desc: Sporty and modern, this signature Calvin Klein polo shirt is crafted from a compact cotton blend for a smooth hand with an extra sleek feel. Created with an allover CK monogram logo print. Detailed with a polo shirt collar, button closures and a vented hem for an effortless fit.

title: Faded Logo Crewneck T-Shirt
desc: Crafted from soft cotton, this t-shirt is made for breathable, comfortable wear. Styled with short sleeves and a crewneck. Features a Calvin Klein logo at the upper chest.

title: 9' Stretch Tech Short
desc: A sporty essential with simple, versatile styling. These shorts are designed with slip pockets at both sides and welt pockets at the back. Features a Calvin Klein logo detail near the back pocket.

title: Relaxed Fit Standard Logo Hoodie
desc: Reimagined classics, iconic Calvin. Cut from 100% cotton premium weight French terry in the perfect relaxed fit, this hero hoodie is finished with Calvin Klein standard logo embroidery.

title: Slim Fit Jean
desc: An iconic essential, these reimagined jeans are made with flexible stretch denim for enhanced movement and all-day comfort. Updated with heritage inspired logo accents and an iconic logo jacron paper patch at the back waist. Cut in a slim fit with considered detailing and reinforced seams.

title: Supima Cotton Crewneck T-Shirt
desc: A fundamental piece for everyday outfits, this t-shirt features a simple, solid design for versatile wear. Crafted completely from supima cotton with an ultra soft hand for premium comfort. Made with a ribbed crewneck in a classic fit.

title: Brushed Cotton Pull-On Shorts
desc: Effortless and casual, these shorts are made from 100% cotton for breathability and comfortable wear. Styled with an elastic drawstring waistband and slip pockets at both sides. Finished with welt pockets at the back.

title: Slim Fit Jean
desc: An iconic essential, these reimagined jeans are made with flexible stretch denim for enhanced movement and all-day comfort. Updated with heritage inspired logo accents and an iconic logo jacron paper patch at the back waist. Cut in a slim fit with considered detailing and reinforced seams.

title: Faded Monogram Logo Crewneck T-Shirt
desc: Made from 100% cotton, this slim fit t-shirt is designed for comfortable wear. Styled with short sleeves and a crewneck. Features a faded CK monogram logo graphic at the front.

title: Stretch Cotton Slim Fit Thin Stripe Button-Down Shirt
desc: A refined silhouette with considered detailing, this long sleeve woven shirt is cut in a slim fit with an extra soft cotton stretch blend. Designed with an iconic monogram logo at the chest and button-front closures for an elevated and versatile Calvin Klein essential.

title: Monogram Logo Relaxed Fleece Crewneck Sweatshirt
desc: Styled in an oversized silhouette, this crewneck sweatshirt is made with drop shoulders for a relaxed fit. Crafted from a cotton fleece blend for soft, plush comfort. Detailed with banded cuffs at the sleeve openings and features a CK monogram logo design at the front.

title: Classic Trench Coat
desc: A timeless layer to have on rotation, this trench coat has a tailored silhouette with notch lapels that frame the neckline. Styled with drop shoulders and cut in a regular fit. Detailed with a concealed button placket and slip pockets at the sides.

title: Faded Monogram Logo Crewneck T-Shirt
desc: Made from 100% cotton, this slim fit t-shirt is designed for comfortable wear. Styled with short sleeves and a crewneck. Features a faded CK monogram logo graphic at the front.

title: Tech Knit Crewneck Sweater
desc: Woven with a half milano knit, this sweater has a smooth body and a classic fit. Created with long sleeves and a crewneck. Styled with banded cuffs at the sleeve openings.

title: Stretch Cotton Slim Fit Thin Stripe Button-Down Shirt
desc: A refined silhouette with considered detailing, this long sleeve woven shirt is cut in a slim fit with an extra soft cotton stretch blend. Designed with an iconic monogram logo at the chest and button-front closures for an elevated and versatile Calvin Klein essential.

title: Cityscape Graphic Monogram Logo Crewneck T-Shirt
desc: Crafted completely from cotton, this t-shirt is made for soft, breathable wear. Features an oversized CK monogram logo design at the front detailed with a printed cityscape graphic. Styled with short sleeves and a crewneck for a comfortable, classic fit.

title: 90s Loose Fit Jeans
desc: Inspired by denim trends from the 90s, this jean is styled with a loose fit and a medium rise waist. Crafted completely from cotton for a sturdy feel that will break-in over time. Designed with classic 5-pocket styling and finished with a CK monogram logo patch at the back waist.

title: Smooth Cotton Monogram Logo Sweater
desc: Crafted from soft cotton for breathable comfort, this Calvin Klein sweater features an oversized tonal monogram logo design at the front. Made with long sleeves and a crewneck. Styled with ribbed detailing at the neckline, sleeve cuffs, and hem.

title: Cotton Sateen Shorts
desc: Cut from cotton sateen fabric, these shorts feature a soft lustrous finish. Styled with an elastic waistband for a flexible fit. Made with a high rise waist and detailed with slip pockets at both sides.

title: Smooth Cotton Rib V-Neck Sweater Midi Dress
desc: Accentuated with ribbed texture throughout, this sleeveless dress is crafted from 100% cotton for total, breathable comfort. Cut in a slim, fitted silhouette with a V-neckline. Finished with button closures along the front.

title: Monogram Logo Crewneck T-Shirt
desc: Cut in a classic fit, this t-shirt features a CK monogram logo design at the front. Made with a crewneck and crafted from 100% cotton for comfortable wear.

title: 90s Straight Fit Jeans
desc: A 90s-inspired silhouette, these jeans are made with a high rise waist and a straight leg fit. Designed with a zip fly and a top button closure. Finished with a Calvin Klein logo patch at the back waist and crafted from cotton stretch denim for a comfortable fit.

title: Pure Poplin Stretch Shirt
desc: Defined with crisp tailoring and timeless, minimal styling, this button-down shirt captures a concise, elevated look. Cut in a classic fit and detailed with barrel cuffs. Crafted from cotton stretch poplin for a lightweight feel with a refined touch.

title: Flowing Long Sleeve Top
desc: Cut in a relaxed fit, this top is defined with a soft, gentle drape for an elegant silhouette. Made with long sleeves and a boat neckline. Shaped with seaming accents at the front.

title: Cotton Sateen Shorts
desc: Cut from cotton sateen fabric, these shorts feature a soft lustrous finish. Styled with an elastic waistband for a flexible fit. Made with a high rise waist and detailed with slip pockets at both sides.

title: Cage Yarn Chunky Sweater
desc: A chunky pullover sweater, crafted from a soft cotton acrylic blend in a cage yarn knit. Designed with relaxed fit shaping and subtle decorative stitching at the crewneck, shoulders and slit cuffs.

title: Performance Embrace Low Impact Sports Bra
desc: Designed with 4-way stretch for total flexibility, this performance sports bra delivers light support for low impact workouts. Styled with a V-neckline and cut in a fitted silhouette that shapes to your form. Made with a smooth hand and features allover Calvin Klein logo styling.

title: Performance Embrace Super High Waist 7/8 Leggings
desc: Designed with 4-way stretch for total flexibility, these performance leggings feature a super high rise compression waist and a 7/8 length silhouette. Made with side slip pockets, a quick-dry stretch blend, and a moisture wicking finish.

title: Archive Logo T-Shirt
desc: A timeless design, straight from the archive. Cut in a relaxed fit, this t-shirt is crafted with solid jersey in soft, comfortable cotton. Styled with an embroidered CK monogram logo at the upper chest.

title: Monogram Logo Crewneck T-Shirt
desc: Cut in a classic fit, this t-shirt features a CK monogram logo design at the front. Made with a crewneck and crafted from 100% cotton for comfortable wear.

title: Pure Poplin Stretch Shirt
desc: Defined with crisp tailoring and timeless, minimal styling, this button-down shirt captures a concise, elevated look. Cut in a classic fit and detailed with barrel cuffs. Crafted from cotton stretch poplin for a lightweight feel with a refined touch.

title: Archive Logo Fleece Quarter Zip Polo Sweatshirt
desc: Crafted from an extra soft cotton blend fleece, this sweatshirt offers a cozy feel. Designed with a quarter-zip closure and a polo collar. Features drop shoulders for a relaxed, cozy fit. Styled with banded cuffs at the sleeve openings and finished with an embroidered CK monogram logo at the chest.

title: Archive Logo Fleece Shorts
desc: Reimagined classics, iconic Calvin. Designed with an archive-inspired logo, these updated Calvin Klein shorts feature a plush cotton knit fleece blend for premium, all-day comfort. Finished with an elasticated waistband and angled front slip pockets.

title: Flowing Sleeveless Tank Top
desc: Cut in a relaxed fit, this top has a sleeveless silhouette that appears effortlessly chic when styled with a pair of pleated shorts. Defined with seaming lines along the front. Crafted from a recycled polyester blend for reduced environmental impact.

title: 90s Straight Fit Jeans
desc: A 90s-inspired silhouette, these jeans are made with a high rise waist and a straight leg fit. Designed with a zip fly and a top button closure. Finished with a CK logo patch at the back waist and crafted from rigid cotton denim for a sturdy feel that will break-in over time.

title: Soft Cotton Tee
desc: A classic cotton t-shirt, refined in a sleek silhouette. Styled with short sleeves and a crewneck. Made with a soft hand for extra comfort.

title: Archive Logo Fleece Shorts
desc: Reimagined classics, iconic Calvin. Designed with an archive-inspired logo, these updated Calvin Klein shorts feature a plush cotton knit fleece blend for premium, all-day comfort. Finished with an elasticated waistband and angled front slip pockets.

title: Archive Logo Fleece Zip Hoodie
desc: A timeless design, straight from the archive. Designed with a retro-inspired embroidered archive logo, this hoodie sweatshirt features a plush cotton knit fleece blend for premium, all-day comfort. Cut in a relaxed fit with a full zip closure, cropped styling and fine ribbed knit trim.

title: Girls Denim Jacket
desc: A timeless classic, this casual staple freshens up any look. Made with robust denim, distressed details and multiple pockets.

title: Girls Skinny Jeans
desc: Cut in a skinny fit, these jeans are crafted from a cotton polyester stretch blend for comfortable wear. Designed with a zip fly and a top button closure. Styled with slip pockets at both sides and finished with topstitching details.

title: Girls Square Neck Denim Dress
desc: Styled with a square neckline, this denim dress has puffed sleeves with elasticized detailing along the shoulders for a comfortable fit. Designed with button closures at the chest and defined with seaming lines along the bodice. Finished with a CK monogram logo tag near the hem.

title: Girls Cut-Off Denim Shorts
desc: Designed with cut-off styling, these chic girls shorts are made with stretch denim for a flexible fit. Finished with metal hardware, 5-pocket styling, a back waist logo patch, signature omega topstitching and frayed ends.

title: Girls Chambray Belted Shirt Dress
desc: Lightweight in soft chambray, this girls shirt dress is an easy-to-wear summer favorite. Designed with button-front closures and a tie belt at the waist, dual chest flap pockets and contrast topstitching.

title: Girls Ruffle Ribbed Mini Dress
desc: Detailed with ruffles along the sides, this dress has a close fit that flares out at the skirt. Styled in a sleeveless silhouette with a crewneck. Cut in a mini length and finished with CK monogram logo embroidery at the upper chest.

title: Girls Cut-Off Denim Shorts
desc: Designed with cut-off styling, these chic girls shorts are made with stretch denim for a flexible fit. Finished with metal hardware, 5-pocket styling, a back waist logo patch, signature omega topstitching and frayed ends.

title: Girls Light Denim Jacket
desc: An iconic girls jean jacket, crafted from light wash denim with signature logo styling. Finished with a CK woven logo tag and dual chest patch pockets.

title: Girls Sequin Monogram Logo Graphic Dolman T-Shirt

title: Girls Ombre Print Sequin Monogram Logo T-Shirt
desc: An updated graphic girls tee, styled with an ombre print design and a monogram logo at front remixed with sequins. Crafted from soft cotton with a classic crewneck.

title: Boys Monogram Logo Pocket T-Shirt
desc: Cut in a classic fit, this t-shirt is styled with short sleeves and a pocket at the upper chest. Finished with a CK monogram logo at the chest pocket.

desc: Crafted from soft micro pique fabric, this polo shirt delivers a comfortable fit. Styled with short sleeves, a buttoned collar, and an embroidered logo at the left chest.

desc: A classic boys logo tee, designed with fine horizontal stripes and a woven iconic monogram logo tag. Finished with a classic crewneck in soft, breathable cotton.

desc: Casual and iconic, these boys pull-on shorts are perfect for a relaxed weekend outfit. Crafted from breathable cotton denim with an elasticated drawstring waistband and slanted side pockets.

title: Boys Micro Pique Solid Polo Shirt
desc: Crafted from soft micro pique fabric, this polo shirt delivers a comfortable fit. Styled with short sleeves, a buttoned collar, and an embroidered logo at the left chest.

title: Boys Modern Pull-On Shorts
desc: Easy-to-pair and wear all-day, these boys pull-on shorts will work with just about anything you choose to style them with. Crafted from breathable cotton with an elasticated drawstring waistband and slanted side pockets.

desc: Cut in a classic fit, this t-shirt is styled with short sleeves and a pocket at the upper chest. Finished with a CK monogram logo at the chest pocket.
